definition: Anyang prefecture-level city in Henan
surname An
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
positive (electric.)/sun/male principle (Taoism)/Yang, opposite: 陰|阴[yin1]
Anyang prefecture-level city in Henan
Anyang county in Anyang 安陽|安阳[An1 yang2], Henan
Anyang prefecture in Henan

sentences.english: Today we've arrived at the town of Meili in Anyang.
sentences.chinese: 今天我们来到了安阳的美里城。

sentences.english: So I determined to go to Anyang to have a look for myself.
sentences.chinese: 于是我决定亲自前往安阳去见识见识。

sentences.english: Features on this site have similar characteristics as the Yinxu Cultures in the Anyang region.
sentences.chinese: 遗存面貌和安阳地区的殷墟文化别无二致。

sentences.english: Do Anyang have the company who stir-fries a gold?
sentences.chinese: 安阳有没有炒黄金的公司？

sentences.english: What was being waged in Anyang County was strictly a people's war.
sentences.chinese: 安阳县的群众所进行的完全是一场人民战争。

sentences.english: A Anyang financial institutions responsible person plaints say.
sentences.chinese: 安阳一家金融机构负责人感叹说。

sentences.english: The author has recently visited the Second Steel Plant of Anyang Iron and Steel Co.
sentences.chinese: 作者对安阳钢铁公司第二炼钢厂进行了考察。

sentences.english: When I arrived in Anyang, this type of warfare had only just begun.
sentences.chinese: 我到达安阳时，这种打法则刚开始。

sentences.english: Linzhou City of Anyang lies right at the foot of the Taihang Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 安阳的林州市就坐落太行山脚下。

sentences.english: After that in the cultural relic archaeology, Anyang also many times excavates the chinaware and the kiln furniture.
sentences.chinese: 其后，在文物考古中，安阳还多次发掘出瓷器和窑具。

sentences.english: In the period of Jing Yuan, Buddhism had a further development.
sentences.chinese: 宋金元时期安阳佛教和道教进一步得到发展。

sentences.english: The main geothermal energy resource of Anyang City is the underground hot water.
sentences.chinese: 安阳市地热资源主要为地下热水。

sentences.english: What kind of place is Anyang with so many famed artifacts?
sentences.chinese: 这安阳是什么地方，怎么净出这么有名的东西？

sentences.english: Anyang Street, Ruian City People's Government of the resident Wansong East 154.
sentences.chinese: 瑞安市人民政府驻地安阳街道万松东路154号。

sentences.english: The discovery occurred in anyang, Henan Province, which was the capital city of the Shang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 发现地是河南省安阳，那里是当年殷商的故都。

sentences.english: Anyang Xinsheng Machine Tool Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 安阳鑫盛机床股份有限公司。
